summary: Project involves GST letter templates with watermark image support. User is removing loan GST and adding a watermark image to the GST letter.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Goods and Services Tax Ashoka Pillar emblem logo with tricolor (saffron, white, green) decorative wings and 'Goods and Services Tax' text label, square format (gst-watermark.dim_400x400.png)

existing_features.title: Remove the Loan GST document type from the application. This includes removing it from the DocumentType enum, the form's document type selector, any built-in template definitions for GST Letter in getTemplate.ts, and all related rendering/generation logic so it no longer appears as an option anywhere in the UI.

Add the uploaded GST watermark image (Goods and Services Tax / Ashoka Pillar emblem) as a static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/gst-watermark.png and use it as the default watermark image on the GST Letter document template. The watermark should be rendered centered on the document with reduced opacity so it does not obscure the text content.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add watermark image on GST letter using attached image
